title: Knorr Sauce Mix - Parma Rosa - 1.3 oz - Case of 12
features: The mouth watering aroma of sweet tomatoes gives this creamy pasta sauce mix the irresistible Italian flavor experience we crave. Knor
Knorr Parma Rosa Sauce Mix Turns Ordinary Pasta Into A Delicious Meal. This 1.3 Oz. Sauce Is Made With Dehydrated Tomatoes,
Dehydrated Parmesan Cheese Blends, Garlic Powder, Parsley And Spices For A Delectable Dish That'S Bursting With Cheese Flavor. With Only 50 Calories Per Serving,
This Sauce Mix Has Only 10 Calories From Fat And Is Cholesterol-Free And Contains No Trans Or Saturated Fat

For our Knorr Pesto Pasta Sauce, our chefs took the classic Italian recipe, in all its basil-and-parmesan-flavored glory, and transformed it into an easy pasta sauce mix that will take just about any dish you can imagine to the next level.
description: Makes 1-1/4 cups. Whisk sauce mix and 1-1/4 cups mix in small saucepan. Add 1 tbsp margarine or butter and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 4 minutes. For a lower fat sauce feel free to use non-fat milk or omit the margarine.Product DetailsLets make Knorr! www.letsmakeknorr.com. Questions or comments? 1-866-KNORR-01 Made in Canada.
